title: How can gang stalking been around for so long? Does anyone know of somebody that died as a result of this? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. Celebrities Jean Seaberg and Ernest Hemingway died of suicide because they were harassed by the FBI. The first studied case of workplace mobbing ended in suicide. Workplace mobbing is group harassment by coworkers. In that case a Danish man got a job in Sweden and his coworkers made fun of his accent. He became upset and The more upset he became the more they harassed him. He eventually got fired and his reputation was so damaged he couldn't get a job and he killed himself. Before that he had never suffered a complaint. The east German stasis would hire citizen spies to harass people to death. Very few psychiatrists are interested enough in their jobs to help a stalking victim so they actually contribute to the stalking. Sometimes they do it intentionally in government owned facilities.
